extendedInfo.description: CatchBirds is an awesome, funny slasher game.Swipe up across the screen to catch birds, butterflies, dragonflies, balloons, UFO and super-women. With four games modes in single player. The addictive gameplay will keep you coming back for even higher scores.CatchBirds features three packed gameplay modes - Simple, UFO, Rocket and time limitless Rocekt, featuring powerups including Plus Score, Minus Score, Double Score, and Freeze! Have a try and have fun!
